make_model.create_pickle(path, model)¶

Saves the model object to a pickle file.

make_model.make_model(frame)¶

Takes the movie DataFrame and splits it into a training/test set. Decision tree model is created from training set and evaluated on the test data.

Args:
frame (DataFrame): used to build the various data sets and model.
Returns:
Model object which can predict movie revenue
